title: shasan
author: shasan
content: I am trying to find out the best crypto base gambling site for cricket. Who will not decrease my betting limit if I win big amount or frequently. I have used several site who has never told me anything if I make loss. But if I win then they limit my bet. For example if I can place bet for 1000$ when they limit my bet I can bet only about 10$ or something like that. So, if anyone can refer any good site who will not limit my bet amount limit, I will be thankful.
